title: First mate
creator_credit: Swinburne Institute of Technology. Film and Television School and Jane Karslake
brief_description: Clarrie and Lex are mutually supportive old mates. However, the onset of senility threatens and finally destroys their independence. Good performances and sensitive portrayal of problems of aged men.
creator_credit_for_label: Swinburne Institute of Technology. Film and Television School and Jane Karslake
